body: wtf is with the very last page tho?
This was dark... But mostly sad. Respect for the MC he blew those things back to hell

This was one of those few doujinshi's that actually spooked me pretty bad.  It had that type of feeling of dread that just makes you pity the character and feel for them in my opinion.  At least the ending makes it up for it lol.
Everything after the first one sucked. Too much human on tribute stuff and not nearly enough mist god on tribute action.

I know this is 4 years too late for me but, i think the story isn't that bad, i mean it is really dark and sad. But it can be related to other stuff in Reality. All i can say is, this story may be kinds depressing but it left a hole in my soul, Nice work Creator, you have my respect.
It hit me hard if it was 2 years ago I'd have nightmares but now it's just sadness 😢 so so sad

Got damn!........holy fuck just......just..........damn..........I......I...........I dont know what to say..........fuck........welp....I won't be using the internet or anything related for a while cause I'll be killing myself
That was really fucked up, at least the ending was good.
Bruh. That was dark. Really fucking dark.
